alert.note: Alert for Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 12:03AM CDT until July 29 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in northwestern Arkansas... Southeastern Washington County in northwestern Arkansas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1203 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Huntsville to 2 miles northwest of Winslow, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Huntsville... Winslow... St. Paul... Wesley... Saint Paul... Kingston... Aurora... Boston... Devils Den State Park... Pettigrew... Brentwood... Japton... Witter... Marble... Georgetown... Red Star... Alabam... Crosses... Combs... Dutton... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 41 and 46. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
